name: plumy

having large feathers: A flock of plumy white birds perched on the rooftops. I felt a plumy wing brush against my cheek.
looking like a large feather: Sissy is a large brown-and-white cat with a plumy tail. I sat in the garden admiring the plumy heads of the flowers.
